ECEnumeration.description: Describes the parking island construction type.
Describes a design surface usage and/or material.
Describes how a road or driveway design is crowned.
When creating intermediate points along an edge, specify which vertex (if any) of which to copy properties from.
Specifies the type of control vertex used for surface control.

ECEnumerator.name: NORMAL
ECEnumerator.description: Control vertex that uses a fixed elevation for the spatial interpolation calculation.

ECEnumerator.name: SLOPE
ECEnumerator.description: Specialized control vertex that uses slope constraints in the spatial interpolation calculation.

ECEnumerator.name: SLOPEDIRECTION
ECEnumerator.description: Specialized control vertex that uses slope constraints along a single direction in the spatial interpolation calculation.

ECEntityClass.description: Path Vertex that is located at the start or end of a Path, in other words, it only has a single PathEdge attached to it
Path Vertex that has two PathEdge instances attached to it, in other words.
The first and last Vertex of a DrivewayPath.

ECProperty.description: Offset of cul-de-sac, negative for left.
Cul-de-sac right of way entrance radius.
Cul-de-sac right of way exit radius.
Sets the size of the flared entrance radius. Exit will be defined by the drive side of the road.
Sets the size of the flared exit radius. Entrance will be defined by the drive side of the road.

ECEntityClass.description: Vertex of a DrivewayPath that is attached to two DrivewayPathEdge instances.

Deprecated.Description: Transition data to be stored in DrivewayTransitions instead.

ECProperty.description: The inner radius of the transition.

Deprecated.Description: Transition data to be stored in DrivewayTransitions instead.

ECProperty.description: The outer radius of the transition.

Deprecated.Description: Transition data to be stored in DrivewayTransitions instead.

ECEntityClass.description: Defines a location point which overrides parking space settings.

ECProperty.description: Number of spaces to be overridden by a parking vertex.
Width to be used for a parking vertex override.
Surface type defined by a parking vertex override.
Minimum slope defined by a parking vertex override.
Maximum slope defined by a parking vertex override.

ECEntityClass.description: Defines a location point to override an entire parking bay settings.

ECProperty.description: Median width defined by a bay override.
Defines the bay override parking depth for primary side.
Defines the bay override parking depth for secondary side.
Defines the bay override parking angle for primary side.
Defines the bay override parking angle for secondary side.

ECEntityClass.description: Defines a location point to override a parking aisle settings.
Defines a location point to override a parking island settings.

ECProperty.description: Defines the island override for it's width.

ECEntityClass.description: Edge class for physical objects such as buildings.

Deprecated.Description: Link Height has been moved to BuildingEdge and PadEdge and renamed to Fixed Height Difference.

ECProperty.description: Treat as a wall for cost optimization.

Deprecated.Description: PropertyArea and by extension PropertyEdge is no longer used for controlling parking setbacks. PropertyArea now serves the purpose of representing grading limits only.
PropertyArea and by extension PropertyEdge is no longer used for controlling building setbacks. PropertyArea now serves the purpose of representing 'grading limits' only.

ECProperty.description: Slope away from edge for grading.
Distance of the slope away from edge for grading.
Type of crown design for path.
Design K-Value for sag vertical curves.
Design K-Value for crest vertical curves.

ECEntityClass.description: One of two sides to a Driveway Path Edge.

ECProperty.description: Cross slope for this side of driveway.
Width of shoulder on this side of driveway.
Slope of shoulder on this side of driveway.
Offset to ditch on this side of driveway.
Ditch slope for this side of driveway.
Radius of the arc before the transition.
Radius of the arc after the transition.
Type of crown design for path.

ECEntityClass.description: One of two sides to a Sidewalk Path Edge.

ECProperty.description: Sidewalk width for this side of the sidewalk.
Cross slope for this side of the sidewalk.
Add area grading data to grading optimizer.
Allow parking spaces to be created inside this area.
Number of parking spaces between islands.
Minimum design slope for parking lot.
Maximum design slope for parking lot.
Surface type or material for parking lot.
Surface type or material for specific parking spaces.
Surface or material depth for specific parking spaces.
Size the pond using the target surface or volume.

Deprecated.Description: DoGrade is deprecated for Grading Area.

ECProperty.description: Surface type or material for grading area.
Surface or material depth for grading area.
Fixed slope constraint on grading area.
Minimum slope constraint on grading area.
Maximum slope constraint on grading area.
Minimum elevation change constraint on grading area.
Maximum elevation change constraint on grading area.
Sets the primary drive side, true to drive on the right-hand side.
Number of minor intervals between two major steps

ECEntityClass.description: Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of RetainingWall rather than per-instance.
Defines a shared set of properties whose values vary per-type of Curb rather than per-instance.

ECProperty.description: Onside parking space width for this side of driveway.
Onside parking space depth for this side of driveway.
Onside parking space angle for this side of driveway.
Onside parking space count per island on this side of driveway.
Onside parking island width for this side of driveway.
Onside parking island curb radius for this side of driveway.
Onside parking surface type for this side of driveway.
Onside parking material depth for this side of driveway.
Onside parking minimum design slope for this side of driveway.
Onside parking maximum design slope for this side of driveway.
Defines the type of sidewalk or material.

ECStructClass.description: Describes a distance along a linear path, as either an absolute distance or a percent along

ECProperty.displayLabel: Applicable when IsDistanceAbsolute is true. It is the distance along the linear path in meters
Applicable when IsDistanceAbsolute is false. It is the percent along the linear path
True if DistanceAlong property should be used, false if PercentAlong describes the distance. Undefined implies an absolute distance

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that defines a target element's location relative to the linear path defined by the source element. When the source element is changed the target element's location should be updated based on the relationship properties

ECStructProperty.displayLabel: Distance along linear, in meters or percent

ECProperty.displayLabel: Perpendicular offset from linear. Positive is to the right, negative to the left, relative to the linear path direction
True if distance is from the start of the linear path, false if it is from the end. Undefined implies it is from the start

ECRelationshipClass.description: A relationship that defines a drainage node's location relative to the linear path defined by the source element. When the source element is changed the target element's location should be updated based on the relationship properties
A relationship that describes how a bis:SpatialLocationElement can represent a bis:PhysicalElement

ECEntityClass.description: An interface that can be mixed-into a shaped area or layout area to indicate that it can be a surface control area.
An interface that represents a spatial entity that is processed into one or more control points for controlling a surface.
An interface used to identify any entity that participates in surface control.
A 3D point on a surface whose elevation is used in spatial interpolation with other control points.

ECProperty.description: Specifies the type of control vertex used.
Slope of the line emanating from this vertex position.
Direction of the line emanating from this vertex position that constrains the elevation interpolation.
True if the direction constraint should represent two lines emanating from the position, forming a V shape, or false if it should be a single line passing through the position.

ECEntityClass.description: Represents a rule that has update logic between one or more elements.

ECStructClass.description: Specifies stroking options for a linear element.

ECProperty.description: Indicates whether the stroke is a breakline.
Indicates whether the stroke operation emit intermediate control points.
Specifies the source to derive the intermediate control point type from.

ECEntityClass.description: A ruled constraint between two surface control vertices.

ECStructProperty.description: Specifies stroke options for adding points along the path.

ECEntityClass.description: Constrains two surface control vertices to have a constant elevation difference between each other.

ECProperty.description: Delta defined by a control vertex override.

ECEntityClass.description: Constrains two surface control vertices to lie on the same line defined by the slope between them.

ECProperty.description: Slope defined by a control vertex override.

ECEntityClass.description: Defines a location point which controls low point control object.

Deprecated.Description: SurfaceControlLowPoint is no longer used for surface control, use SurfaceSlopedControlVertex instead.

ECProperty.description: Slope defined by a control low point override.
Max radius defined by a control low point override.

Deprecated.Description: SurfaceControlLowPointRule is no longer used for surface control, use SurfaceSlopedControlVertex instead.
SurfaceControlLowPointRuleGroupsVertices is no longer used for surface control.
SurfaceControlOwnsRules is no longer used for surface control, use SurfaceControlOwnsControlElement instead.
SurfaceControlOwnsVertices is no longer used for surface control, use SurfaceControlOwnsControlElement instead.

ECProperty.description: Controls the spacing of the XY grid used when generating the triangulation for the interpolated surface.

ECStructProperty.description: Specifies stroke options for adding points along the path.
